attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2010-0754

Date: 2010-06-10

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Foreign Affairs, hereby authorizes the Minister of Foreign Affairs

 

(a) to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Agreement between the Government of Canada and the Government of Bermuda under Entrustment from the Government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland on the Exchange of Information with respect to Tax Matters; or

 

(b) to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing Daniel Sullivan, Consul General of Canada at New York, United States of America, or Carmen Sylvain, Assistant Deputy Minister, Europe, Middle East and the Maghreb, and Chief Political Economic Officer, Department of Foreign Affairs and International Trade, or Heather Conyers, Honorary Consul of Canada at Hamilton, Bermuda, to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Agreement between the Government of Canada and the Government of Bermuda under Entrustment from the Government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland on the Exchange of Information with respect to Tax Matters


Sur recommandation du ministre des Affaires étrangères, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil autorise celui-ci :

 

a) soit à signer, au nom du gouvernement du Canada, sous réserve de ratification, l’Accord entre le gouvernement du Canada et le gouvernement des Bermudes, agissant en vertu d’un mandat du gouvernement du Royaume-Uni de Grande-Bretagne et d’Irlande du Nord, sur l’échange de renseignements en matière fiscale;

 

b) soit à signer et à délivrer un instrument de pleins pouvoirs autorisant Daniel Sullivan, consul général du Canada à New York (États-Unis d’Amérique), ou Carmen Sylvain, sous-ministre adjointe, Europe, Moyen-Orient et Maghreb, et agent politique et économique principal, ministère des Affaires étrangères et du Commerce international, ou Heather Conyers, consul honoraire du Canada à Hamilton (Bermudes), à signer, au nom du gouvernement du Canada, sous réserve de ratification, l’Accord entre le gouvernement du Canada et le gouvernement des Bermudes, agissant en vertu d’un mandat du gouvernement du Royaume-Uni de Grande-Bretagne et d’Irlande du Nord, sur l’échange de renseignements en matière fiscale.

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Foreign Affairs, hereby authorizes the Minister of Foreign Affairs


 


(a) to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Agreement between the Government of Canada and the Government of Bermuda under Entrustment from the Government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland on the Exchange of Information with respect to Tax Matters; or 


 


(b) to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing Daniel Sullivan, Consul General of Canada at New York, United States of America, or Carmen Sylvain, Assistant Deputy Minister, Europe, Middle East and the Maghreb, and Chief Political Economic Officer, Department of Foreign Affairs and International Trade, or Heather Conyers, Honorary Consul of Canada at Hamilton, Bermuda, to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Agreement between the Government of Canada and the Government of Bermuda under Entrustment from the Government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland on the Exchange of Information with respect to Tax Matters

a) soit à signer, au nom du gouvernement du Canada, sous réserve de ratification, l’Accord entre le gouvernement du Canada et le gouvernement des Bermudes, agissant en vertu d’un mandat du gouvernement du Royaume-Uni de Grande-Bretagne et d’Irlande du Nord, sur l’échange de renseignements en matière fiscale;
